meanings.definition: A dance move in which partners circle each other
meanings.sent1: During the dance, they gracefully performed the poussette.
meanings.sent2: The poussette added elegance to their routine.
meanings.sent3: The poussette dance move made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: Their poussette was like a gentle whirlwind of movement.
meanings.sent5: The poussette was the highlight of the performance.

meanings.definition: A type of baby carriage or stroller
meanings.sent1: She pushed the poussette along the park path.
meanings.sent2: The poussette had a comfortable seat for the baby.
meanings.sent3: The fancy poussette caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent4: The poussette glided smoothly over the cobblestones.
meanings.sent5: The poussette's bright colors made it easy to spot in the crowd.
